properties.areaDesc: Point Betsie to Sleeping Bear Point MI; Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI; Manistee to Point Betsie MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 4:33PM EST until January 3 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves around 7
feet.

* WHERE...Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI, Point
Betsie to Sleeping Bear Point MI and Manistee to Point Betsie
MI.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
